alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 9:54PM EST until January 05 at 11:34AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. Wabash River at Lafayette and at Montezuma. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... East Fork White River near Rivervale. White River at Elliston...and at Edwardsport down to Hazleton. Wabash River at Covington...and at Terre Haute down to Riverton... and at Mount Carmel. .Upwards of two inches of rainfall this past weekend put several rivers across central Indiana into flood. The Wabash is expected to crest near Hutsonville Wednesday...and the crest on the White River will approach Petersburg through Thursday. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Seymour. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Significant agricultural lands begins to flood. High water affects some local roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 PM EST Tuesday was 14.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 6.9 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued by noon Wednesday.
